column1: 'How did you hear about the ESN Buddy Programme?'
'Would you like to receive an email once the Buddy & Integration committee organises an activity for buddies?'

column2: you agree that we share the following personal information with the students matched to you: your full name
column3: your email address and your phone number.'

column1: 'I will send an email to bic@esn-groningen.nl in time if in any case
column2: I cannot be a buddy anymore.'
